question: [Practice] Italiano: Calcola area e perimetro del triangolo con vertici (113, 148), (192, 129), (171, 133).

qas.question: [Practice] Italiano: Calcola area e perimetro del triangolo con vertici (113, 148), (192, 129), (171, 133).
[Practice] Polski: Oblicz pole i obwod trojkata o wierzcholkach (113, 148), (192, 129), (171, 133). Provide only the area.
[Brief] Portugues: Calcule a area e o perimetro do triangulo definido por (113, 148), (192, 129), (171, 133). Provide only the perimeter.
